job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with product manager on the product roadmap
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to work with product management to define the direction and strategy of the product, which is a core aspect of understanding the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: translate requirements into feasible technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to understanding business needs (requirements) and translating them into actionable technical plans.

job_tasks.phrase: designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and other data
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of data engineering activities, focusing on the creation and improvement of data processing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the development and upkeep of data infrastructure and solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that the team follows (engineering) best practices
job_tasks.justification: While this touches on leadership, it also implies the implementation and adherence to standard software engineering practices for the team.
This involves making crucial decisions about the technical design and implementation of systems, a key part of software development leadership.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts
committed to developing themselves and learning new skills
translate requirements into feasible technical solutions
establish the team's culture and way-of-working

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering and tech leadership, with no explicit mention of generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning. The role appears to be more aligned with traditional data infrastructure and software development leadership.
